characters.name: Goku
characters.description: The main protagonist of the Dragon Ball franchise, Goku is a Saiyan warrior who came to Earth as a baby. He is known for his incredible strength, determination, unwavering optimism, and his constant desire to get stronger. Despite his Saiyan heritage, Goku is incredibly kind-hearted and always strives to protect his friends and family. He is a master of martial arts and has trained under many powerful teachers, allowing him to reach incredible heights of power.

characters.name: Vegeta
characters.description: The proud prince of the Saiyan race, Vegeta is Goku's eternal rival. He is known for his arrogance, ambition, and powerful strength. Despite his initially antagonistic nature, Vegeta has developed a sense of loyalty to his adopted home, Earth, and his family. He is driven by a desire to become the strongest warrior in the universe and constantly strives to surpass Goku.

characters.name: Piccolo
characters.description: A powerful Namekian warrior who initially served as an antagonist, Piccolo eventually becomes a valued ally and mentor to Goku and his friends.  Piccolo has a stoic personality and is known for his strength and wisdom.  He is devoted to protecting Earth and has become a father figure to Gohan.

characters.name: Gohan
characters.description: Goku's son, Gohan is a powerful Saiyan with a strong sense of justice and a penchant for studying. Initially reluctant to embrace his Saiyan heritage, Gohan eventually comes to terms with his power and becomes a formidable warrior.  Despite his strength, Gohan prioritizes his studies and family life.

characters.name: Frieza
characters.description: A ruthless and powerful space tyrant, Frieza is one of the most iconic villains in the Dragon Ball franchise. He is known for his cold-hearted nature, extreme power, and his incredible strength. Frieza is driven by an insatiable thirst for power and is willing to do whatever it takes to achieve his goals.
key_events: Defeat at the hands of Goku

characters.name: Cell
characters.description: A bio-engineered android created by Dr. Gero, Cell is a powerful and cunning antagonist who seeks to absorb the energy of other fighters to achieve his perfect form.  Cell is a ruthless and arrogant fighter who enjoys tormenting his opponents and reveling in his power.
key_events: Defeat at the hands of Gohan

characters.name: Majin Buu
characters.description: A powerful and playful creature of pure energy, Majin Buu is an unpredictable and destructive antagonist who can absorb other beings to increase his power.  Buu is known for his childlike nature and his tendency to act on his impulses.  He is often unaware of the consequences of his actions, leading to widespread destruction.
key_events: Splitting into Good and Evil Buu
Defeat at the hands of Goku

characters.name: Broly
characters.description: A legendary Saiyan warrior with immense power, Broly is known for his overwhelming strength and uncontrollable rage.  Broly's power is said to surpass even that of a Super Saiyan God, making him a formidable opponent for even the strongest warriors. His rage is triggered by the presence of Goku, resulting in a deep hatred and an insatiable desire for vengeance.
key_events: Confrontation with Goku on Planet Vegeta

characters.name: Beerus
characters.description: The God of Destruction of Universe 7, Beerus is a powerful and enigmatic deity who enjoys challenging strong fighters.  Beerus has a playful yet dangerous personality, often using his power for his own amusement.  He is known for his love of food and his desire to find worthy opponents.
key_events: Awakening and search for the Super Saiyan God

characters.name: Whis
characters.description: Beerus's loyal attendant and mentor, Whis is an angel with immense power and wisdom.  Whis is calm and collected, often observing events with a detached amusement.  He is a skilled martial artist and possesses a vast understanding of the universe.
key_events: Helping Goku become a Super Saiyan God
Participating in the Tournament of Power

characters.name: Jiren
characters.description: A powerful warrior from Universe 11, Jiren is known for his stoic nature and his incredible strength. Jiren is a master of martial arts and possesses immense power, even surpassing that of a God of Destruction. He is driven by a strong sense of justice and a desire to protect the innocent.
key_events: Participating in the Tournament of Power
Losing to Goku in the Tournament of Power

characters.name: Trunks
characters.description: Vegeta and Bulma's son from an alternate future, Trunks is a powerful Saiyan who travels to the past to warn Goku and his friends about the coming threat of the Androids.  Trunks is a determined and courageous warrior who is willing to fight for what he believes in, even when faced with seemingly insurmountable odds.
key_events: Traveling to the past to warn Goku

characters.name: Bulma
characters.description: A brilliant scientist and inventor, Bulma is a key figure in the Dragon Ball franchise.  She is known for her intelligence, determination, and her ability to create advanced technology. Bulma is a vital member of Goku's group and often provides critical support during their battles against powerful enemies.
key_events: Developing technology to aid Goku and his friends

characters.name: Krillin
characters.description: Goku's best friend and a talented martial artist, Krillin is a loyal and dedicated warrior who always stands by his friends.  Krillin is known for his kind-hearted nature and his determination to protect the innocent, even though he lacks the raw power of some of his allies.
